column4: Hey, my amarok is hanging the moment i Play a song. What could be the reason ???
getting any error messages?
No, just a blank small window on the top left of the screen and later it says force quit.. I have the codecs and have been using it till yesterday.. and also, the drive is mounted
WHat you could do, but that could be a bit advanced, is to strace it.
Umm, and that means ???
Can try whatever the others are saying first, see if you find a better solution. :-)
i think i'll try restarting the X first.. that solves most of the probs...
I doubt it.
I clicked the icon and the system monitor shows more than 25 processes of amarok, each around 1.1 MB
The reason it's hanging is most probably when it's opening a file, whether it's the audiodriver, the song or perhaps any library.
Oh wow, you could kill those.
there are 4 amarok and many more amarokapp!!
Kill every single one, then start amarok again.
When i kill the last 2-3 processes they come back again.. Why is that ??
and the number is increasing automatically !! :(

Since i don't run amarok i can't check this, but as you may know every process have a 'mother' checking out for them. That process is starting them. But - you could do a 'killall amarok' and 'killall amarokapp'
thanks.. that helped..
So, it works now?
yepp!! prob was with pulseaudio !
those multiple instances were opening trying to open the sound driver..!!
Haha. Well, you know what to do if the problem comes again.
sure i do..
